line_1: Say; shall the terrors thy pale flag unfolds,
line_2: Till with a joyless smile the eye beholds

line_1: Which the page of love unfolds;
Say, shall the terrors thy pale flag unfolds,
line_2: Till with a joyless smile the eye beholds

line_1: The blotted scroll the other hand unfolds,
line_2: Within her hand a vacant string she holds,

line_1: The secrets of dark space unfolds;
line_2: The germ of future Worlds beholds,

line_1: Before the glass her charms unfolds,
line_2: And in herself MY Muse beholds.

line_1: Than the first glance, perhaps, unfolds;
